house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1963 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: Coldwell Banker Success Realty Coldwell Banker Success Realty
